See the 13 GNU General Public License for more details. 14 15 Under Section 7 of GPL version 3, you are granted additional 16 permissions described in the GCC Runtime Library Exception, version 17 3.1, as published by the Free Software Foundation. 18 19 You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License and 20 a copy of the GCC Runtime Library Exception along with this program; 21 see the files COPYING3 and COPYING.RUNTIME respectively. If not, see 22 <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>. */ 23 24 /* Implemented from the specification included in the Intel C++ Compiler 25 User Guide and Reference, version 10.1. */ 26 27 #ifndef _WMMINTRIN_H_INCLUDED 28 #define _WMMINTRIN_H_INCLUDED 29 30 /* We need definitions from the SSE2 header file. */ 31 #include <emmintrin.h> 32 33 /* AES */ 34 35 #if !defined(__AES__) || !defined(__SSE2__) 36 #pragma GCC push_options 37 #pragma GCC target("aes,sse2") 38 #define __DISABLE_AES__ 39 #endif /* __AES__ */ 40 41 /* Performs 1 round of AES decryption of the first m128i using 42 the second m128i as a round key. */ 43 extern __inline __m128i __attribute__((__gnu_inline__, __always_inline__, __artificial__)) 44 _mm_aesdec_si128 (__m128i __X, __m128i __Y) 45 { 46 return (__m128i) __builtin_ia32_aesdec128 ((__v2di)__X, (__v2di)__Y); 47 } 48 49 /* Performs the last round of AES decryption of the first m128i 50 using the second m128i as a round key. */ 51 extern __inline __m128i __attribute__((__gnu_inline__, __always_inline__, __artificial__)) 52 _mm_aesdeclast_si128 (__m128i __X, __m128i __Y) 53 { 54 return (__m128i) __builtin_ia32_aesdeclast128 ((__v2di)__X, 55 (__v2di)__Y); 56 } 57 58 /* Performs 1 round of AES encryption of the first m128i using 59 the second m128i as a round key. */ 60 extern __inline __m128i __attribute__((__gnu_inline__, __always_inline__, __artificial__)) 61 _mm_aesenc_si128 (__m128i __X, __m128i __Y) 62 { 63 return (__m128i) __builtin_ia32_aesenc128 ((__v2di)__X, (__v2di)__Y); 64 } 65 66 /* Performs the last round of AES encryption of the first m128i 67 using the second m128i as a round key. */ 68 extern __inline __m128i __attribute__((__gnu_inline__, __always_inline__, __artificial__)) 69 _mm_aesenclast_si128 (__m128i __X, __m128i __Y) 70 { 71 return (__m128i) __builtin_ia32_aesenclast128 ((__v2di)__X, (__v2di)__Y); 72 } 73 74 /* Performs the InverseMixColumn operation on the source m128i 75 and stores the result into m128i destination. */ 76 extern __inline __m128i __attribute__((__gnu_inline__, __always_inline__, __artificial__)) 77 _mm_aesimc_si128 (__m128i __X) 78 { 79 return (__m128i) __builtin_ia32_aesimc128 ((__v2di)__X); 80 } 81 82 /* Generates a m128i round key for the input m128i AES cipher key and 83 byte round constant. The second parameter must be a compile time 84 constant. */ 85 #ifdef __OPTIMIZE__ 86 extern __inline __m128i __attribute__((__gnu_inline__, __always_inline__, __artificial__)) 87 _mm_aeskeygenassist_si128 (__m128i __X, const int __C) 88 { 89 return (__m128i) __builtin_ia32_aeskeygenassist128 ((__v2di)__X, __C); 90 } 91 #else 92 #define _mm_aeskeygenassist_si128(X, C) \ 93 ((__m128i) __builtin_ia32_aeskeygenassist128 ((__v2di)(__m128i)(X), \ 94 (int)(C))) 95 #endif 96 97 #ifdef __DISABLE_AES__ 98 #undef __DISABLE_AES__ 99 #pragma GCC pop_options 100 #endif /* __DISABLE_AES__ */ 101 102 /* PCLMUL */ 103 104 #if !defined(__PCLMUL__) || !defined(__SSE2__) 105 #pragma GCC push_options 106 #pragma GCC target("pclmul,sse2") 107 #define __DISABLE_PCLMUL__ 108 #endif /* __PCLMUL__ */ 109 110 /* Performs carry-less integer multiplication of 64-bit halves of 111 128-bit input operands. The third parameter inducates which 64-bit 112 haves of the input parameters v1 and v2 should be used. It must be 113 a compile time constant. */ 114 #ifdef __OPTIMIZE__ 115 extern __inline __m128i __attribute__((__gnu_inline__, __always_inline__, __artificial__)) 116 _mm_clmulepi64_si128 (__m128i __X, __m128i __Y, const int __I) 117 { 118 return (__m128i) __builtin_ia32_pclmulqdq128 ((__v2di)__X, 119 (__v2di)__Y, __I); 120 } 121 #else 122 #define _mm_clmulepi64_si128(X, Y, I) \ 123 ((__m128i) __builtin_ia32_pclmulqdq128 ((__v2di)(__m128i)(X), \ 124 (__v2di)(__m128i)(Y), (int)(I))) 125 #endif 126 127 #ifdef __DISABLE_PCLMUL__ 128 #undef __DISABLE_PCLMUL__ 129 #pragma GCC pop_options 130 #endif /* __DISABLE_PCLMUL__ */ 131 132 #endif /* _WMMINTRIN_H_INCLUDED */
